intro: Actinostemon amazonicus, commonly known as the Amazonian star-stem, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of South America. The plant typically grows as an herbaceous perennial with elongated stems and opposite leaves. Its flowers are often brightly colored, ranging from pink to purple, and attract various pollinators.
